=== Additional Information ===
Join us to test the Amarok media player. Bring yourself and/or a friend to test the usability of the program.

=== Attendee List ===
Please sign up for the time that you would prefer*. You can also sign up as an observer for the time before or after your usability study time. Under the user column you may just indicate 1 if you do not wish to disclose their name. If the table fills up feel free to add on the time slot you wish to fill.
